scripts:
set ACL on /content/wintergw2025/us/en/saml-authenticated
  deny jcr:read for everyone
end

set ACL for "offline_access;saml-idp" (ACLOptions=ignoreMissingPrincipal)
  allow jcr:read on /content/wintergw2025/us/en/saml-authenticated
end

set ACL on /content/wintergw2025/us/en/oauth2-authenticated
  deny jcr:read for everyone
end

set ACL for "test-group" (ACLOptions=ignoreMissingPrincipal)
  allow jcr:read on /content/wintergw2025/us/en/oauth2-authenticated
end
